PLEK.F.summary: plenum AG provides management consulting services to utilities, credit institutions, and insurance companies in Germany, Austria, Switzerland, and the United States. The company offers business consulting services, including the development of strategic business and process models; designing core processes and optimization of support and management processes; create request adequate organizational structures; and the design of technical architectures/develop technical designs. It also provides IT management consulting services comprising the development and optimization of business-driven IT strategies and structures; construction of a company-specific IT costs and performance management; efficiency optimization of IT services; and IT sourcing consultancy and strategic management provider services. In addition, the company offers transformation consulting services, such as the design and support of CIP projects and agile organizational development processes; coaching of executives and teams to accompany the progress of the transition process; building project management process and program management structures; and strategic skill planning/development services. It serves to energy and mobility, credit institutions, and insurance industry sectors. plenum AG was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Frankfurt am Main, Germany with additional offices in Vienna, Austria; and Zurich, Switzerland.
